title: 129 - Foxy's Back For A Full Episode
description: On today's show, Foxy returns to cut the cameras as the guys recap Mitt's wild Friday Night into Saturday morning, discuss Connor and Foxy's vacations, and they dive into a loaded Pod FOD that has questions about what cereal reigns supreme, the Zach Snyder Cut of Justice League getting released accidentally on HBO Max, Connor gives his summary as he's just finished Breaking Bad and has some questions for Game of Thrones truthers, the boys discuss Meghan Markle and Prince Harry's interview with Oprah and why the King of Banquets, David Morgan Hewitt may not be happy with the Princess, which chain restaurant is the best, and much more. Don't forget to send your submissions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram and join the Youtube Channel to watch full episodes. We appreciate the hell out of all of you, we'll see you guys Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
